parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a unique identification code: "Cod unic de identificare: 11240060". While not explicitly labeled "CMF," its presence suggests an official identifier used for tracking political advertising, aligning with the characteristics of a CMF number.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "Partidul REPER" and encourages voters to select "poziția 10" on the ballot, directly referencing a specific political party participating in the parliamentary elections. This fulfills the criteria of "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, the content is designed to reach a broad audience, not just individuals.  The use of hashtags like #parlamentare2024 further indicates an intention to reach a wide segment of the population interested in the parliamentary elections. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to persuade voters to support Partidul REPER in the parliamentary elections. Phrases like "Votează poziția 10" and "SUSȚINE PARTIDUL REPER ÎN PARLAMENT" clearly aim to influence voting behavior. This directly satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post's content does not adhere to journalistic standards. It lacks objectivity and instead promotes a specific political party, advocating for their election. It's not presenting news or analysis but rather directly soliciting votes.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post does not express a personal opinion; it's a clear and direct call to action for voters to support a particular party in the election.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1289488752083021</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by Atelierul de internet SRL, promotes Partidul REPER for the parliamentary elections.  The post directly encourages voters to choose position 10 on the ballot, clearly aiming to influence the election outcome. The presence of a unique identification code further strengthens the indication of electoral propaganda.  The post's content, targeting and call to action all point towards a clear intention to influence the vote.  There is no journalistic element present; it's purely promotional.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Partidul REPER</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>REPER</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Atelierul de internet SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea pe Facebook, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări (ID 1289488752083021) cu conținut electoral care promovează Partidul REPER și îndeamnă la votarea acestuia prin mențiuni explicite precum „Votează poziția 10” și „SUSȚINE PARTIDUL REPER ÎN PARLAMENT!”, având ca efect electoral influențarea voturilor în favoarea partidului menționat.  Postarea, fiind plătită și având un cod unic de identificare, constituie propagandă electorală după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
